context: Pinterest focused on shoppable content and AI-powered discovery with 480M+ monthly users. The platform emphasizes positive content and commercial intent as differentiators.

competitors.name: Instagram
competitors.notes: Visual social platform with Shop and Reels

competitors.name: TikTok
competitors.notes: Short-form video becoming discovery and shopping platform

competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: Visual search and Shopping competing for commerce

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Product discovery and inspiration through browsing

competitors.name: YouTube
competitors.notes: Video tutorials and Shorts for inspiration
